00070     template<class Archive>
00071     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00072     {
00073         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractCentreBasedCellPopulation<DIM> >(*this);
00074 
00075         /*
00076          * In its current form the code does not allow the direct serialization
00077          * of the VertexMesh class, so instead we delete mpVoronoiTessellation.
00078          */
00079         delete mpVoronoiTessellation;
00080         mpVoronoiTessellation = NULL;
00081 
00082         archive & mMarkedSprings;
00083         archive & mUseAreaBasedDampingConstant;
00084         archive & mAreaBasedDampingConstantParameter;
00085         archive & mOutputVoronoiData;
00086         archive & mOutputCellPopulationVolumes;
00087         archive & mWriteVtkAsPoints;
00088 
00089         this->Validate();
00090     }

00575 namespace serialization

00580 template<class Archive, unsigned DIM>
00581 inline void save_construct_data(
00582     Archive & ar, const MeshBasedCellPopulation<DIM> * t, const BOOST_PFTO unsigned int file_version)
00583 {
00584     // Save data required to construct instance
00585     const MutableMesh<DIM,DIM>* p_mesh = &(t->rGetMesh());
00586     ar & p_mesh;
00587 }
00588 
00593 template<class Archive, unsigned DIM>
00594 inline void load_construct_data(
00595     Archive & ar, MeshBasedCellPopulation<DIM> * t, const unsigned int file_version)
00596 {
00597     // Retrieve data from archive required to construct new instance
00598     MutableMesh<DIM,DIM>* p_mesh;
00599     ar >> p_mesh;
00600 
00601     // Invoke inplace constructor to initialise instance
00602     ::new(t)MeshBasedCellPopulation<DIM>(*p_mesh);
00603 }
00604 }
